meanings.sent1: The teacher was frustrated by the impertinencies in the student's essay.
meanings.sent2: The impertinencies in his speech made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The impertinencies in the clown's performance were unintentionally hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her impertinencies towards authority were like a rebellious storm.
meanings.sent5: The impertinencies of the toddler's questions were both amusing and innocent.

meanings.sent1: He couldn't help but chuckle at the impertinencies of the young child.
meanings.sent2: The boss was not pleased with the impertinencies of the employee during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Her impertinencies at the dinner party caused a few raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The impertinencies of the comedian were met with roaring laughter.
meanings.sent5: The impertinencies of the cat towards the dog were met with a playful swat.
